channel.title: Verincraft Minecraft Anarchy Server
channel.description:
Hey guys I'd like to let you know of an great server called Verincraft It's an anarchy Server with Factions and PvP the IP is verincraft.com The staff is really Nice and fair, the owner is _BroodLord_ and the Co-Owner GDION They are both really nice just be sure not to break any rules and Hope to see you there!
IP: Verincraft.com
Owner: _BroodLord_
Co-Owner: GDION

item.title: Verincraft Minecraft Anarchy Server
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

The name of your server has been cropping up way too much in this board for my liking. I count atleast 5 seperate threads that have been made for this single advertisement ‘campaign’. If I see another new thread for Verincraft, they will all be removed. If you wish to advertise new features then edit the original one.

Read full topic
